metadata.name: Suspicious Runscripthelper.exe
metadata.comment: Detects execution of powershell scripts via Runscripthelper.exe

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\runscripthelper.exe')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('surfacecheck')))

output.summary: Detects execution of powershell scripts via Runscripthelper.exe

metadata.objective: Examine fields: process.cmd_line False positive: Unknown Reference: https://lolbas-project.github.io/lolbas/Binaries/Runscripthelper/
